Deprecated List

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAds.clearLocation ()
We recommend using the new object-based APIs in com.flurry.android.ads.

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAds.clearTargetingKeywords ()
We recommend using the new object-based APIs in com.flurry.android.ads.

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAds.clearUserCookies ()
We recommend using the new object-based APIs in com.flurry.android.ads.

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAds.displayAd (Context context, String adSpace, ViewGroup viewGroup)
We recommend using the new object-based APIs in com.flurry.android.ads.

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAds.enableTestAds (boolean test)

We recommend using the new object-based APIs in com.flurry.android.ads. Call to receive test ads from the Flurry server to ensure proper implementation. Test ads do not generate revenue and therefore MUST be disabled before submitting to the Market.

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAds.fetchAd (Context context, String adSpace, ViewGroup viewGroup, FlurryAdSize size)
We recommend using the new object-based APIs in com.flurry.android.ads.

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAds.getAd (Context context, String adSpace, ViewGroup viewGroup, FlurryAdSize size, long timeout)
We recommend using the asynchronous ad serving flow with fetchAd, displayAd and FlurryAdListener, instead of using this method.

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAds.initializeAds (Context context)
initializeAds is now handled automatically.

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAds.isAdAvailable (Context context, String adSpace, FlurryAdSize size, long timeout)
We recommend using the asynchronous ad serving flow with fetchAd, displayAd and FlurryAdListener, instead of using this method.

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAds.isAdReady (String adSpace)
We recommend using the new object-based APIs in com.flurry.android.ads.

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAds.removeAd (Context context, String adSpace, ViewGroup viewGroup)
We recommend using the new object-based APIs in com.flurry.android.ads.

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAds.setAdListener (FlurryAdListener listener)
We recommend using the new object-based APIs in com.flurry.android.ads.

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAds.setLocation (float lat, float lon)
We recommend using the new object-based APIs in com.flurry.android.ads.

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAds.setTargetingKeywords (Map< String, String > targetingKeywords)
We recommend using the new object-based APIs in com.flurry.android.ads.

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAds.setUserCookies (Map< String, String > userCookies)
We recommend using the new object-based APIs in com.flurry.android.ads.

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAgent.onError (String errorId, String message, String errorClass)
See onError(String, String, Throwable)

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAgent.onEvent (String eventId)

See logEvent(String).

See logEvent(String, Map < String, String >).

See logEvent(String, Map < String, String >).

Member com::flurry::android::FlurryAgent.onStartSession (Context context, String apiKey)
See onStartSession(Context)

Class FlurryAds
We recommend using the new object-based APIs in com.flurry.android.ads unless you are creating an interface to third party network mediation using ICustomAdNetworkHandler.
